name: Orion Invasion
description:
Orion Invasion - Demo Version 0.1.0

ORION INVASION is a retro- style shooter / bullet hell game with a mix of platform events for those who enjoy hours of action and lots of bullets. Explore mysterious places of the Orion constellation, and join Bullet Squadron in company of Taja and Lylou to stop the attacks of "The Drevils" and prevent the invasion of Andromeda Galaxy. Hope you like it!

NOTE:
  • Platform events are available only in pre - alpha version.
  • You can choose between two characters only in this DEMO version.
  • This version only works for PC - Windows 7 / 8 / 10.
GAMEPLAY SUMMARY

  • Play retro-style shooter/ bullet hell with a mix of platform game events.

  • Enjoy traditional shooter gameplay style with cool graphics in 2D/ 3D.

  • Choose between two characters (Taja or Lylou), each one with a single combat spaceship.

  • Up-grade your combat skills between four different ammo levels, including special attacks.

  • Prevent shield damage and improve your protection capacity.

  • Destroy all enemies and proyectiles using the bomb special attack.

  • Re-fill your energy status with energy power-ups.

  • Evade Asteroids attacks during the combat.

  • Cool retro style sound-track produced and mixed by our friends FIERO and Ketsueki Sakuru
CONTROL OVERVIEW
  • (A, W, S, D) or arrow keys to move.
  • (G) key to activate "BOMB" or (Q) as an alternative key
  • (H) key to activate "SHIELD" or (E) as an alternative key
  • (P) key to activate Pause menu.
  • (Esc) key to exit application.
  • Gamepad partially compatible and Playstation controls too.
